title: Incorrect "Build" popup action enablement
description: When using the Java perspective, the "Build" action in the context-sensitive popup menu is always enabled, regardless of the state of the project or file.
OB: Currently, the "Build" action in the context-sensitive popup menu is always enabled in the Java perspective.
EB: The "Build" action in the context-sensitive popup menu should only be enabled when there are changes in the project or file that need to be built.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the Java perspective.
2. Right-click on a project or file.
3. In the context-sensitive popup menu, observe that the "Build" action is always enabled, regardless of any changes in the project or file.
